pages.text: Spawning rules have been adjusted.$(li1)Piglins on netherrack$(li1)Wither skeletons on nether bricks$(li1)Zombie Piglins on magma blocks$(li1)Magma slimes on crimson/warped hyphae$(li1)Ghasts spawn on gravel$(li1)Hoglins spawn on crimson nylium$(li1)Endermen on soul sand/soil$(li1)Blazes on quartz blocks

Mobs don't spawn on blocks not listed here. The only mob not listed that does naturally spawn is the Strider, whose spawning rules and drop rates have not been changed. Most mobs' drop rates have generally been increased.
